__e: I know that sounds lame in its vagueness, but, I assure you, Oz will be back.
Details are sketchy, but somehow he managed to get his hands on his father's gun.
It's still a little vague, but I can remember more this time.
Or maybe you'll be vague and just say, "Something important's come up."
I couldn't stop running it over and over and over in my mind, the vague and distant suspicion that we never understood what happened that night, what our role was.
It's vague and it's in flashes,but I do.
